name: Turmeric Tea Poached White Fish

ingredients.name: Turmeric & Ginger Blend Enhanced Herbal Tea

preparation: Combine water, lemon juice, and Tea in a frying pan and bring to a boil. Steep for 5 minutes, strain, and return liquid to pan.
Season fish with Seafood & Fish Seasoning, Sea Salt, and Black Pepper.
Gently place fish in liquid, cover pan and simmer for 8â€“12 minutes (depending on thickness of fillets), spooning hot liquid overtop as the fish cooks.
Fish is done when it flakes easily with a fork. Remove with a slotted spoon and serve with mashed potatoes or rice pilaf.
